list.title: BP operated BosShelf yard
list.description: At the heart of the Caspian region, the BP-operated BosShelf yard stands as a flagship model of offshore infrastructure development and strategic collaboration. From complex topsides integration to precision-driven module fabrication, the yard reflects BP’s commitment to operational excellence, safety, and innovation — powering energy ambitions with industrial strength and regional impact. The BP-operated BosShelf yard is more than an industrial site — it’s a strategic launchpad for offshore innovation in the Caspian region. With world-class fabrication facilities, a highly skilled workforce, and seamless integration with BP’s global operational standards, BosShelf delivers mission-critical infrastructure that fuels national energy goals and global supply resilience. Built for high-volume offshore construction, the BosShelf yard—under BP’s operational leadership—delivers precision-engineered modules, jackets, and decks for complex offshore fields. From structural steelwork to integrated topside systems, every ton of output reflects world-class QA/QC, safety culture, and schedule discipline.

list.title: Lukoil Petrol Station
list.description: Annual maintenance and service contract with  Lukoil covering Petrol Stations, Petrol Terminal and other facilities. Our comprehensive annual maintenance and service contract with Lukoil ensures the smooth operation of petrol stations, petrol terminals, and other critical facilities. We provide regular inspections, preventive maintenance, and prompt repairs to uphold safety standards and operational efficiency. With a dedicated team of professionals and a commitment to quality, we guarantee reliable service, minimizing downtime and optimizing performance across all covered locations.

list.title: Pasha Holding | PMD | FMG

With a commitment to excellence, we deliver reliable solutions tailored to the unique requirements of each project, ensuring durability, safety, and seamless execution from start to finish

list.title: Technip Energies Constuction

From structural upgrades to interior refurbishments, our expertise ensures high-quality execution while maintaining efficiency and safety. list.title: Annual Construction and maintenance contract with ABB

Our expertise ensures the seamless upkeep, renovation, and structural integrity of bank premises, maintaining high standards of safety, efficiency, and aesthetics. From routine maintenance to large-scale upgrades, we are committed to delivering reliable solutions that support ABB’s operational excellence.

list.title: HVAC ITV (Ictimai/Public TV)
list.description: We provide comprehensive HVAC maintenance and service solutions under our annual and ad-hoc contract with ITV (Ictimai/Public TV). Covering all essential heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems, our expert team ensures efficient climate control, routine inspections, emergency repairs, and system optimizations. With a focus on reliability and performance, we help maintain a comfortable and operational environment, supporting ITV’s broadcasting and workplace needs year-round.

list.title: Ongoing contract with Schlumberger
list.description: Our ongoing contract with Schlumberger covers a wide range of construction, maintenance, and repair works, ensuring operational efficiency and infrastructure reliability. We provide expert solutions for HVAC and MEP systems, as well as general structural upgrades, facility maintenance, and specialized repairs. With a commitment to quality and precision, our services support Schlumberger’s facilities by delivering safe, durable, and efficient solutions tailored to their requirements.

list.title: Gas Export branch of SOCAR
list.description: Our extensive contract with the Gas Export branch of SOCAR covers over 400,000 square meters of blasting and painting works for main gas pipelines. With a focus on durability, safety, and corrosion protection, our specialized services ensure the longevity and reliability of critical infrastructure. Using advanced techniques and high-quality materials, we deliver precision coatings that meet industry standards, supporting the continuous and efficient operation of SOCAR’s gas export facilities.

list.title: Oil and Gas Construction Trust of SOCAR
list.description: We successfully executed a large-scale cleaning, backfilling, and compacting project for Oil and Gas Construction Trust of SOCAR, transforming waste lands in Absheron. Through meticulous planning and advanced techniques, we ensured efficient land restoration, enhancing environmental sustainability and site usability. Our expertise in handling large volumes of material and precision earthworks contributed to the seamless completion of this critical project, reinforcing SOCAR’s infrastructure and operational goals.

list.title: Fencing works for SOCAR Downstream Management
list.description: During shutdown operations, we successfully executed a complex scope of painting and blasting works, ensuring the protection and durability of critical infrastructure for SOCAR Downstream Management. Additionally, our fencing works enhanced security and site integrity, meeting stringent industry standards. With precision techniques and high-quality materials, our team delivered reliable solutions that support operational efficiency and long-term facility maintenance
